input: 오타니 선수 올해 성적이 어떻게 돼?
query:
SELECT season_type, player_name, 
       avg AS bat_avg, hr AS bat_hr, ops AS bat_ops, wrc_plus AS bat_wrc, war AS bat_war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT player_name, team_name, hr, rbi, avg, ops, wrc_plus, war, barrel_rate
FROM mart_batter_stats
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
LIMIT 1000;

SELECT t.season_type, t.player_name, t.g, t.h, s.war FROM mart_batter_total t LEFT JOIN mart_batter_stats s ON t.player_name = s.player_name AND t.season = s.season WHERE t.player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND t.season = 2025 ORDER BY CASE WHEN t.season_type = 'RegularSeason' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END LIMIT 1000;

SELECT t.season_type, t.player_name, t.g, t.h, s.war 
FROM mart_batter_total t 
LEFT JOIN mart_batter_stats s 
ON t.player_name = s.player_name AND t.season = s.season 
WHERE t.player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND t.season = 2025 
ORDER BY CASE WHEN t.season_type = 'RegularSeason' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END 
LIMIT 1000;

SELECT season_type, player_name, 
       avg AS bat_avg, hr AS bat_hr, ops AS bat_ops, wrc_plus AS bat_wrc, war AS bat_war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT season_type, player_name, 
       avg AS bat_avg, hr AS bat_hr, ops AS bat_ops, wrc_plus AS bat_wrc, war AS bat_war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT t.season_type, t.team_name, 
       t.avg AS bat_avg, t.hr AS bat_hr, t.wrc_plus AS bat_wrc,
       p.era AS pit_era, p.w AS pit_w, p.l AS pit_l
FROM mart_team_batting t
JOIN dim_team_mapping m ON t.team_name = m.team_code
JOIN mart_team_pitching p ON t.team_name = p.team_name AND t.season = p.season AND t.season_type = p.season_type
WHERE m.korean_name ILIKE '%LA 다저스%' AND t.season = 2025
ORDER BY t.season_type;

SELECT season_type, player_name, hr
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT season_type, player_name, 
       ops AS bat_ops
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE (player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
   OR player_name ILIKE '%Soto%' 
   OR player_name ILIKE '%Judge%' 
   OR player_name ILIKE '%Acuña%' 
   OR player_name ILIKE '%Harper%') 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY ops DESC;

input: 오타니 선수와 에런저지 선수의 성적을 비교해줘
query:
SELECT season_type, player_name, 
       hr AS bat_hr, avg AS bat_avg, ops AS bat_ops
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT season_type, player_name, 
       hr AS bat_hr, avg AS bat_avg, ops AS bat_ops
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Judge%' AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT season, season_type, player_name, hr
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT season, season_type, league, player_name, team_name, g, ab, h, hr, rbi, sb, bb, so, avg, obp, slg, ops, wrc_plus, war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY season_type;

-- 내셔널리그(NL) 홈런 순위
SELECT season_type, player_name, team_name, hr, avg, ops
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE season = 2025 AND league = 'NL'
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

-- 아메리칸리그(AL) 홈런 순위
SELECT season_type, player_name, team_name, hr, avg, ops
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE season = 2025 AND league = 'AL'
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT player_name, team_name, hr, avg, ops
FROM mart_batter_total
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT player_name, team_name, hr, avg, ops
FROM mart_batter_total
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT season_type, player_name, w, l, g, gs, sv, ip, so, bb, era, whip
FROM mart_pitcher_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani Shohei%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT game_date, season, season_type, league, team_name, ab, h, hr, rbi, sb, bb, so
FROM mart_batter_daily
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM game_date) = 7
ORDER BY game_date;

input: 오타니 선수 올해 홈런 갯수 얼마야?
query:
SELECT season_type, player_name, hr
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = 2023
ORDER BY hr DESC;

input: 오타니 선수 올해 홈런 갯수 얼마야?
query:
SELECT season_type, player_name, team_name, hr
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT season_type, player_name, team_name, hr
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' AND season = 2025
ORDER BY hr DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT season_type, player_name, g AS games, w AS wins, l AS losses, era, so AS strikeouts
FROM mart_pitcher_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY era DESC;

SELECT season_type, player_name, team_name, hr, avg, ops, war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT season_type, player_name, w, l, era, so
FROM mart_pitcher_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

input: 오타니 선수 올해 성적은 어떻게 돼?
query:
SELECT season_type, player_name, hr, avg, ops, war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

SELECT season_type, player_name, w, l, g, era, so
FROM mart_pitcher_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;

input: 오타니 선수 올해 성적이 어떻게 되나요/
query:
SELECT season_type, player_name, team_name, hr, avg, ops, war
FROM mart_batter_total
WHERE player_name ILIKE '%Ohtani%' 
  AND season = 2025
ORDER BY season_type;
